title: Ranked Bans
body:
For players that show little intent to improve or climb, by trolling/inting etc. 
What if instead of chat restricting these players we banned them from ranked? 

Since this is not a perma ban and they can still play, these bans could occur with much less leniency, saying "KYS" 4 times automatically results in a temporary ranked ban. 
Intentionally feeding a game that can be proven systemically can issue a 5 day ranked ban that just grows. 
If a player does something to force the game to lose and is caught/proven. That player receives the ban. 
If a ban expires that player must have played at least X normal games before he can go back to ranked. 
If ever needed, a permanent ranked ban can be issued of course. 
Details can be worked out, but what about the concept?

replies.body: Or, stop banning and punishing people bacause they say mean words and ban the people who are the actual problem : inters, soft inters, afks, people who give up early. smurfs.

If Riot were to find a 100% working method to stop people from smurfing and each player would have 1 account ever, they'd be so-many-times more carefull with random BS like inting or trolling or whatever.

But in reality you can create lol new acc within 2-3 minutes or buy it for as little as few bucks. So why bother trying? You get banned? brb 3 minutes later you got new acc.

Yes! We want to punish those that are doing these things by taking them out of games. Its more strict then a chat ban, but gives them more leniency than a permanent ban. Which allows Riot to throw it out more, and still allow them to reform while not impacting as many games.
Makes too much sense. @Riot would never implement such a thing.
So, the old punishments? While it looks good for ranked it turned draft into a toxic shitfest

This was once implemented? I've never heard of it. 
When?
Regardless Draft and ranked are already toxic. Moving those toxic players out of Ranked will only make the integrity of Ranked better, yes it's unfortunate more casual players have to deal with more trolls, but they have less on the line than a Ranked player. 
I personally think the trade is worth it.
I don't remember when they implemented it but it surely was there in season 5. Wasn't really working though (people would just go flame in normal or jump on a Smurf. .) so they removed it
28 votes for yes, but 3 nos and 17 down votes whelp I got botted. lol__
The game is already bleeding players, they should do this and take bets on how soon they have to start shutting down servers.
Rather have less players, or no game over toxic players in my ranked games honestly. It loses player due to the toxic ones why not try to lose the toxic players and get the good ones back?

The problem with smurfs is not that they're doing good in low elo, but the fact that they dont care about the games they play on a smurf. So many time I've had a smurf who just leaves to play on another account becuase he didnt like the way the game as going and wasnt too bothered to actually make an effort.

Sure would be nice if there was something that made that account unable to do that anymore. Where they are forced to go to norms only or stop playing on it? *wink* *wink*

Seriously though that brought up a good additional point. You could also force players that are banned to play a certain amount of normal games to make sure that they are just not absorbing the ban duration with another account.

It would be possible. 
If a players has an unusually high win rate and is level 30  Plat 3 70% win rate. Pretty crimson of a flag. 

Best way to combat smurfs in my opinion is phone verification.
